about.title: Welcome to InverGo. The most intuitive investment and contact administration and management system.
about.subtitle: Stop using notebooks or Excel-style systems, they are in the past. InverGo is here.
about.items.1.desc: Create a personalized agenda for your contacts. Manage them as Investors or normal Contacts.
about.items.2.desc: In addition to adding your contacts, add those important meetings so you never forget anything.
about.items.3.desc: Create and manage your contacts' investments as well as your own.
about.ask.title: Frequent Questions
about.ask.1.desc: It is a useful application / website for investors in order to automate and digitize all their contacts, in addition to being able to manage their investments in a much easier and more intuitive way. And the best... you don't need to install anything. All tools are included on the site.
about.ask.2: What are the requirements to be able to use InverGo?
about.ask.2.desc.1: You can use our site from any device with a stable internet connection. In order to get the best visual experience, it is recommended to use a device with a screen resolution equal to or greater than 1280x720 px. (HD).
about.ask.2.desc.2: It should be remembered that this site is not adapted and optimized for use with a mobile device. This is because the rendering size of these devices is very small, so content should be removed or hidden to ensure the experience. In any case, if you need to use the site with a mobile device, there is the possibility of using a 'Desktop version', a function that is included in browsers such as Google Chrome.
about.ask.3: Do I need an Active License to be able to use InverGo?
about.ask.3.desc: That's correct, in order to access your account and use the tools we offer, you must have an active subscription to our system. This helps us to keep the site operational and to manage the accounts of all our users. Likewise, when more tools are included, it will not be necessary to make any kind of extra payment. Simply with your active subscription you can enjoy all our features and all the improvements we create.
terms.title: Terms and Conditions
